game_description: Are you ready to smash some balls in VR? Black Hole Pool is the ultimate Pool/Billiard VR experience with the most accurate physics and great graphics. There are many ways to enjoy the beautiful world of Pool. RELEASE YOUR INNER HUSTLER! The Hustle Bar is a social place where players from all around the world meet to play for virtual stakes. Collect coins and spend them on cool accessories. BE THE BEST! Are you feeling competitive? you can play for ELO points in the Ranked Room against randomly matched opponents. Collect ELO points to climb the leaderboard and be the best. HANG OUT WITH FRIENDS! Finally, the band splits up tonight. The VIP Room is an invite-only place for you and your friends. Chill with your friends, shoot some balls, and enjoy your favorite videos together on a huge TV. DO YOU WANT SOME SOLITUDE? Practice alone or play against an AI opponent while watching your favorite movies in the Private Room. EXPRESS YOURSELF! Collect experience points (XP) to unlock cool accessories like cues, ball sets, and felts. Customize the experience as you like. The only thing missing is you. See you at the table.

review_2: I've always been addicted to pool and this game is my zen, I spend most of my night time playing until my Quest 2 battery dies on me, the physics and visuals are incredible, and that YouTube screen lets me set the perfect mood, so kudos to the developers for this absolutely fantastic title!
review_3: This is an update to my prior review. This app used to use the Meta avatars. In the last update they got rid of that and changed the avatars to built-in ones that look very weird. The hands and wrists especially look awfulâ€¦ like a rubber chicken getting twisted. Iâ€™m tired of having to create new avatars for games. The Meta ones are good enough and look much less awkward than these new ones. Iâ€™m also not a fan of the arcade-style games they added into the practice pool hall, which have very mediocre physics. It makes what used to feel like a very polished and professional game feel cheaper and cheesier. Critiques aside, this is still the best pool game on Quest by far, with great physics and great visuals. I just donâ€™t want to see it going the wrong direction. Please donâ€™t try to be like that ForeVR junkâ€¦
review_4: So it definitely feels more real then other pool games and graphics are better but I don't know what happened they used to have the hoops and punching bag game in there for others to play on while waiting on a table or in general but just went in and they have been removed ughhh... won't give it 5 star till back devs
review_5: I used to play this game quite regularly. I came to play a game of pool (after some time) and was initially disappointed with the new version. After I initially gave the game a one star review â€“ I really thought more on it - and I thought that I should really take a good look at the new game - to be very fair. After doing so I realize the game is not as bad as I initially reviewed it. In fact I did enjoy playing it with the new changes. I wish to apologize to the developers for my initial one star review and Iâ€™m changing it to four stars. I know that you are most likely aspiring to make it a five star game. My apologies on my initial review and reaction.ï¿¼
